creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: female figure standing at center, gazing upward toward small bird at UL; PL hand toying with comb in hair; PR hand holding bouquet of white irises; child attendant kneeling at her PL wiping tea bowl; various tea accessories at R
title: Courtesan Listening to Singing of Little Cuckoo
